title: Bug 18268 - Not finding images and files in NL specific subdirectories
description: Bug 18268 - Not finding images and files in NL specific subdirectories in build 200205291235.
OB: When opening the about dialog, it is observed that there is a main image present.
EB: The expected behavior is that when opening the about dialog, the main image should be displayed correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Start Eclipse.
2. Delete the file located at 'install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif'.
3. Edit the file 'install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini'. Change the value of the 'aboutImage' property to 'aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif'.
4. Edit the file 'install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini' again. Change the value of the 'aboutImage' property to 'aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif'.
5. Open the about dialog.
